name: Cardiovascular_mortality_Comparator_Evidence_from_MAGICapp_313877
title: MAGIC-derived ComparatorOnlyEvidence: Cardiovascular mortality in Standard care Group in Adults with type 2 diabetes with moderate CV risk

targetReference.display: MAGICapp Conversion Report: SGLT2 inhibitors and GLP-1 RA for type 2 diabetes

note.text: From RECODe to an estimate per 1000 patients for 5 years with the following assumption: CV mortality is 2/3 of all-cause mortality (https://sanjaybasu.shinyapps.io/recode/).

variableDefinition.description: Adults with type 2 diabetes with moderate CV risk -- Standard care

observed.display: Standard care Group in Adults with type 2 diabetes with moderate CV risk
